title: Court of Flame and Ashes
description: Royalty, abductions, fated mates, and dragons...⁠⁠After his father's death, Prince Kastian is on the brink of losing everything. The only way to change his fate is to forge a bond with a stranger from another realm.⁠⁠Finding that she's been abducted, college student Lyra wakes up in another world and is told she's fated to be a queen. She can't just walk away from her home and loved ones... or can she?⁠⁠When the two come together in the dragon realm, they will either destroy each other or form the most powerful magic known to Abraxas.⁠*Check out the connected series:The Dragon Born AcademyCracked OpenOver EasyHard BoiledFrying NightSunny Side Up
author: T.L. Christianson
